name: Quantum Connection
description:
Game requires a controller.  Singleplayer game but can be alternatively played with two players using one controller.

Use analogue sticks to move characters and RB and LB buttons to jump.

You and your spouse were researching the dimensional portal. But opening the portal resulted in an unexpected accident and the lab blew up. Only you survived, your spouse did not. Days go by, and there is not a single moment you don't think about your deceased spouse. One day you notice a bright light right where your spouse used to be. The bright light gives you the feeling of love and warmth that you have just lost. You don't know why, but you know you have to go back to the lab and try to open the dimensional portal again. You have lost access to the lab because of the incident, now you and the bright light need to break in without being seen.
